text: is a martial arts organisation established to teach and spread the art of karate. Gichin Funakoshi was the leader who was most responsible for its beginning in 1936.Nihon Karate-do shotokai, History ; retrieved 2012-11-9. ==References== == Other websites == * Shotokai Encyclopedia * Karate-do shotokai Europe (KDSE) * Nihon Karate-do shotokai, Japan Category:1936 establishments in Asia Category:Japanese martial arts Category:1930s establishments in Japan
title: Shōtōkai
